user_query: I want to surprise my partner with a romantic date night at a casino. Can you recommend some casinos with fine dining options and live entertainment? Also, provide me with a list of upcoming tournaments that we can participate in for some added excitement.

TaskList.description: Research casinos that offer fine dining options and live entertainment.
Filter the list of casinos to ensure they meet the criteria of fine dining and live entertainment.
Find and compile information on upcoming tournaments taking place in the selected casinos.
